request.description:
### Register User

This endpoint is used to register a new user.

- Method: POST
- Base URL: {{baseUrl}}
- Path: /users/register
    

#### Request Body

- Type: raw (application/json)
    

| Key | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| name | string | The name of the user |
| email | string | The email address of the user |
| password | string | The password for the user account |

#### Response

- Status: 409
- Content-Type: application/json
    

``` json
{
    "message": "The error message",
    "status": "The status of the request",
    "data": "null"
}

 ```

- Status: 201
- Content-Type: application/json
    

``` json
{
    "message": "User registered successfully"
}

 ```

This endpoint allows users to log in via an HTTP POST request to {{baseUrl}}/users/login. The request should include a raw body with the user's email and password.

### Request Body

- email (string): The user's email
- password (string): The user's password
    

Upon a successful execution, the server will respond with a status code of 200 and a JSON object in the response body. The response includes a message, status, and a data object containing a token for the authenticated user.

### Response

- message (string): A message from the server
- status (string): The status of the response
- data (object): An object containing the user's token
    

Example Response:

``` json
{
    "message": "success",
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
        "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VyX2lkIjoxLCJleHAiOjE3MDg3MjQwNTJ9.qjzQM-c8IUp_x-F5CCAwGlbTKj0-xVO7333y554W7Gs"
    }
}

 ```
